docs.snippet: Markets had slumped after an earlier revelation that more of Hillary Clinton’s emails were being reviewed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Markets had slumped after an earlier revelation that more of Hillary Clinton’s emails were being reviewed.
docs.abstract: Stocks post biggest gain in eight months, ending nine-day losing streak; analysts attribute rebound to FBI's announcement that it found no evidence to warrant new charges against Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher After F.B.I. Decision
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Soars After F.B.I. Decision

docs.snippet: The lettering is crude, scrawled in black spray paint on the sidewalk in front of Karen Peters’ neatly kept home in the quiet, working class neighborhood where she’s lived most of her life. But the contempt is clear....
